open{sensors}data

extract // connect // share // remix

what

extract
connect
news&doc
share
remix

Extract

o{s}d is a services start-up that analyses, work out and deploy hardware prototype in order to extract, connect, share and remix world raw (open)data. Its goal is to bridge the gap between social potentialities and real digital possibilities and contests through sensors technology.

Arduino and Raspberry are the most famous but the sensors are so many and "between us". We trust in the evolution of Internet of Things (IoT) by the Internet of Places through the different contests
